attributes.action: scrap prescription charges for hospital acquired MRSA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: at the moment you are charged for prescriptions for MRSA caught while in hospital.this can amount to quite a lot for antibiotics and eradication program wash etc.this should be stopped and the hospital not being allowed to back out by saying that most people carry it anyway so it cant be proved that you got it while you were in hospital.why should we pay to get rid of something the hospital gave us.
